titleStmt.title: Lying allowable with papists to deceive Protestants: in a letter / written by a minister of the Church of England,to satisfie a friend who was much stagger'd at the reading the speeches of the late traytors, who at their death, June 25. 1679. so confidently affirmed their innocency.
titleStmt.author: Minister of the Church of England.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
